name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Underscored git branch name from Jira task

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated creation of branch name from Jira task Id and task name

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can easily put into clipboard a valid branch name built from Jira task you currently opened, like "TASK-123_Your_Jira_task_title".

As an option you can put in clipboard just Task name with Id: "TASK-123 Your Jira task title".

It works on task detail page, or if you just open modal window clicking on card on board, or when you click on a row in a backlog.

German umlauts and special chars replacement is supported.
